entityName: AMREIT MONTHLY INCOME & GROWTH FUND III LTD

EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

DerivativeNotionalAmount.label: Derivative, Notional Amount
DerivativeNotionalAmount.description: Aggregate notional amount specified by the derivative(s). Expressed as an absolute value.

AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date, including liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, compensation costs, payroll taxes and fringe benefits (other than pension and postretirement obligations), contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.

AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndN.label: Accounts Payable, Related Parties
AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndN.description: Amount for accounts payable to related parties.

AccountsReceivableNet.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties
AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties.

AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.label: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRecoveries.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Recoveries of Bad Debts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRecoveries.description: Reflects a reduction in bad debt expense attributable to collections of loans and lease receivables which had previously been fully or partially charged off as bad debts.

AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs and Discounts
AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AverageSalesPrices.label: Average Sales Prices
AverageSalesPrices.description: The revenues derived from sales of oil or gas in each geographic area during the reporting period divided by the number of barrels of oil produced or thousands of cubic feet of gas produced.

BelowMarketLeaseAccumulatedAmortization.label: Below Market Lease, Accumulated Amortization
BelowMarketLeaseAccumulatedAmortization.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

BelowMarketLeaseGross.label: Below Market Lease, Gross
BelowMarketLeaseGross.description: Amount before amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

BelowMarketLeaseNet.label: Below Market Lease, Net
BelowMarketLeaseNet.description: Amount after amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

BusinessAcquisitionSharePrice.label: Business Acquisition, Share Price
BusinessAcquisitionSharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks paid or offered to be paid in a business combination.

Capital.label: Banking Regulation, Total Capital, Actual
Capital.description: Amount of total capital as defined by regulatory framework.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ConstructionInProgressExpendituresIncurr.label: Construction in Progress Expenditures Incurred but Not yet Paid
ConstructionInProgressExpendituresIncurr.description: Future cash outflow to pay for construction in progress expenditures that have occurred.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.label: Long-term Debt, Gross
DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate
DebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of debt outstanding.

DeferredCostsLeasingAccumulatedAmortizat.label: Deferred Costs, Leasing, Accumulated Amortization
DeferredCostsLeasingAccumulatedAmortizat.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, the accumulated amortization, as of the reporting date, which represents the periodic charge to earnings of initial direct costs which have been deferred and are being allocated over the lease term in proportion to the recognition of rental income.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DepreciationAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
DepreciationAndAmortization.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DerivativeFixedInterestRate.label: Derivative, Fixed Interest Rate
DerivativeFixedInterestRate.description: Fixed interest rate related to the interest rate derivative.

DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Gain (Loss), Net
DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) of derivative instruments not designated or qualifying as hedging instruments.

DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfOtherIncome.label: Discontinued Operation, Amount of Other Income (Loss) from Disposition of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfOtherIncome.description: Other income (loss) amounts, net of tax expense or benefit, relating to a disposal group that is classified as a component of the entity, exclusive of the following elsewhere enumerated categories: income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, provision (or any reversals of earlier provisions) for loss on disposal, and adjustments of a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax
DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation During Phase-out Period, Net of Tax
DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until disposal.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Depreciation and Amortization
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of depreciation and amortization expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, General and Administrative Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of general and administrative expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Interest Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of interest expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Interest Income
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of interest income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Income (Loss)
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating income (loss) attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of other expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Income
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of other income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Rental Income
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of rental income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Revenue
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of revenue attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Declared
DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.description: Amount of equity impact of cash distribution declared to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

DueFromRelatedParties.label: Due from Related Parties
DueFromRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from related parties including affiliates, employees, joint ventures, officers and stockholders, immediate families thereof, and pension funds.

EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.label: Equity Method Investment, Ownership Percentage
EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.description: The percentage of ownership of common stock or equity participation in the investee accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment Summarized Financial Information, Equity (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: Amount of equity, including noncontrolling interest, reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Liabilities and Equity (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of liabilities and equity reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Net Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of net income (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Revenue (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: Amount of revenue from sale of product and rendering of service reported by equity method investee.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

ExtinguishmentOfDebtGainLossNetOfTax.label: Extinguishment of Debt, Gain (Loss), Net of Tax
ExtinguishmentOfDebtGainLossNetOfTax.description: The difference between the reacquisition price and the net carrying amount of the extinguished debt recognized currently as a component of income in the period of extinguishment, net of tax.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetAcquiredInPlac.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Acquired-in-Place Leases
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetAcquiredInPlac.description: This element represents the amount of value allocated by a lessor (acquirer) to lease agreements which exist at acquisition of a leased property. Such amount may include the value assigned to existing tenant relationships and excludes the market adjustment component of the value assigned for above or below-market leases acquired.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

GainLossOnDispositionOfRealEstateDiscont.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Real Estate, Discontinued Operations
GainLossOnDispositionOfRealEstateDiscont.description: Amount of difference between the carrying amount and the sales price of real estate properties sold as part of discontinued operations.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties
GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperty.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Oil and Gas and Timber Property
GainLossOnSaleOfProperty.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of oil and gas property or timber property.

GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.label: Gain (Loss) Related to Litigation Settlement
GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Investment Real Estate
GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of real estate owned for investment purposes.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

GuaranteeObligationsCurrentCarryingValue.label: Guarantor Obligations, Current Carrying Value
GuaranteeObligationsCurrentCarryingValue.description: The current carrying amount of the liability for the freestanding or embedded guarantor's obligations under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees.

GuaranteeObligationsMaximumExposure.label: Guarantor Obligations, Maximum Exposure, Undiscounted
GuaranteeObligationsMaximumExposure.description: Maximum potential amount of future payments (undiscounted) the guarantor could be required to make under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees before reduction for potential recoveries under recourse or collateralization provisions.

ImpairmentOfRealEstate.label: Impairment of Real Estate
ImpairmentOfRealEstate.description: The charge against earnings in the period to reduce the carrying amount of real property to fair value.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder in a publicly trade limited partnership (LP) or master limited partnership (MLP).

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndOthe.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndOthe.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations incurred but not paid, and operating obligations classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableRelated.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable, Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableRelated.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for goods and services provided by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries, subsidiaries of a common parent, an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableRela.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable, Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableRela.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due to the reporting entity for good and services provided to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCharges.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Charges
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCharges.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of expenditures made during the current reporting period for benefits that will be received over a period of years. Deferred charges differ from prepaid expenses in that they usually extend over a long period of time and may or may not be regularly recurring costs of operation.

IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfUnhedgedDer.label: Increase (Decrease) in Fair Value of Derivative Instruments, Not Designated as Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfUnhedgedDer.description: The increase (decrease) during the period, which was recognized in earnings, in the unrealized gains or losses on derivative instruments that are not or are no longer designated as hedging instruments.

IncreaseDecreaseInLeasingReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Leasing Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInLeasingReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from lessees arising from lease agreements.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Security Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in security deposits.

InterestAndOtherIncome.label: Interest and Other Income
InterestAndOtherIncome.description: The amount of interest income and other income recognized during the period. Included in this element is interest derived from investments in debt securities, cash and cash equivalents, and other investments which reflect the time value of money or transactions in which the payments are for the use or forbearance of money and other income from ancillary business-related activities (that is, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestExpenseRelatedParty.label: Interest Expense, Related Party
InterestExpenseRelatedParty.description: Amount of interest expense incurred on a debt or other obligation to related party.

InterestIncomeRelatedParty.label: Interest Income, Related Party
InterestIncomeRelatedParty.description: Amount of interest income earned from interest-bearing assets owed to the entity by related party.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InvestmentBuildingAndBuildingImprovement.label: Investment Building and Building Improvements
InvestmentBuildingAndBuildingImprovement.description: Aggregate of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of investments in building and building improvements.

InvestmentIncomeNet.label: Investment Income, Net
InvestmentIncomeNet.description: Amount after accretion (amortization) of discount (premium), and investment expense, of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.label: Investments in and Advance to Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures
InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.description: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.

Land.label: Land
Land.description: Amount before accumulated depletion of real estate held for productive use, excluding land held for sale.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountDistributio.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Distribution Amount
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountDistributio.description: The total amount of distributions to limited partners.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of limited partner units outstanding.

LoansPayable.label: Loans Payable
LoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByNon.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Ownership Percentage by Noncontrolling Owners
MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByNon.description: The equity interest of noncontrolling shareholders, partners or other equity holders in consolidated entity.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding limited partnership unit.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionAccountsR.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Accounts Receivable Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionAccountsR.description: "The amount of accounts receivable that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionFixedAsse.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Fixed Assets Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionFixedAsse.description: "The amount of fixed assets that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionPayablesA.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Payables Assumed
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionPayablesA.description: "The amount of payables that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Divestiture, Amount of Consideration Received
NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.description: Amount of noncash consideration received for selling an asset or business through a noncash (or part noncash) transaction.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotesPayableFairValueDisclosure.label: Notes Payable, Fair Value Disclosure
NotesPayableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of notes payable.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

NotesReduction.label: Notes Reduction
NotesReduction.description: The value of notes retired (or transferred to another entity) in noncash investing or financing transactions.

NumberOfRealEstateProperties.label: Number of Real Estate Properties
NumberOfRealEstateProperties.description: The number of real estate properties owned as of the balance sheet date.

OffMarketLeaseUnfavorable.label: Off-market Lease, Unfavorable
OffMarketLeaseUnfavorable.description: This element represents a liability associated with the acquisition of an off-market lease when the terms of the lease are unfavorable to the market terms for the lease at the date of acquisition.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum rental payments in aggregate as of the balance sheet date under operating leases.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Current
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within one year of the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fifth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fourth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the third year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the second year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum lease payments receivable under operating leases for periods greater than five years following the balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Lease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.description: The total amount of revenue recognized for the period from operating leases, including minimum lease revenue, contingent revenue, percentage revenue and sublease revenue.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherNotesPayable.label: Other Notes Payable
OtherNotesPayable.description: Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.

OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueO.label: Other Significant Noncash Transaction, Value of Consideration Received
OtherSignificantNoncashTransactionValueO.description: "The value of the noncash (or part noncash) consideration received in a transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of a transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

OwnedPropertyManagementCosts.label: Owned Property Management Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OwnedPropertyManagementCosts.description: The aggregate costs related to management of owned properties during the reporting period.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering.

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sold in Public Offering
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.description: The number of units sold in a public offering of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAttributableToNoncontroll.label: Partners' Capital Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
PartnersCapitalAttributableToNoncontroll.description: Total of all Partners' Capital (deficit) items which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest).

PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.label: Partners' Capital, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.description: Amount of partners' capital (deficit), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

PaymentsForLoans.label: Payments for Loans
PaymentsForLoans.description: Cash payments for and related to principal collection on loans related to operating activities.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfLoanCosts.label: Payments of Loan Costs
PaymentsOfLoanCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan origination associated cost which is usually collected through escrow.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a controlling interest in another entity or an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PaymentsToAcquireLand.label: Payments to Acquire Land
PaymentsToAcquireLand.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes land acquired for use by the owner.

PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.label: Payments to Develop Real Estate Assets
PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.description: Payments to develop real estate assets is the process of adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements; and are generally classified as cash flow from investing activities.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromDistributionsReceivedFromRea.label: Proceeds from Distributions Received from Real Estate Partnerships
ProceedsFromDistributionsReceivedFromRea.description: The cash inflow from earnings received from real estate partnerships.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromRealEstateAndRealEstateJoint.label: Proceeds from Real Estate and Real Estate Joint Ventures
ProceedsFromRealEstateAndRealEstateJoint.description: The cash inflow from the sale of real estate held-for-investment and real estate joint ventures.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRentsReceived.label: Proceeds from Rents Received
ProceedsFromRentsReceived.description: Cash received for rents during the current period.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Notes Payable
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromSaleOfBuildings.label: Proceeds from Sale of Buildings
ProceedsFromSaleOfBuildings.description: The cash inflow from sale of buildings.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

ProfitLossFromRealEstateOperations.label: Profit (Loss) from Real Estate Operations
ProfitLossFromRealEstateOperations.description: The net cost of operation of other real estate (including provisions for real estate losses, rental income, and gains and losses on sales of real estate).

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueDisclo.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Fair Value Disclosure
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueDisclo.description: Fair value portion of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationDepreci.label: Real Estate Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationDepreci.description: Amount of depreciation expense for the period.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationOtherDe.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Other Deduction
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationOtherDe.description: Amount of other deductions to accumulated depreciation, excluding sales, for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationRealEst.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Investment in Real Estate Sold
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationRealEst.description: Amount of decrease to accumulated depreciation for real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAccu.label: Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Accumulated Depreciation (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAccu.description: The amount of accumulated depreciation for the property as of the balance sheet date.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Amount of Encumbrances
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.description: Amount of lien or mortgage outstanding on real estate investment properties for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Building and Improvements, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Land, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Carrying Amount of Land and Buildings and Improvements (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Gross amount at which land and buildings and improvements are carried at the end of the period for each property.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCost.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Cost
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCost.description: Amount of cost capitalized subsequent to acquisition for real estate investment property, including, but not limited to, real estate tax and insurance, by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes initial purchase price and improvement, and real estate not held as investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Building and Improvements
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Land
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Cost of Investment in Real Estate Sold
RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.description: Amount of real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Gross
RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.label: Real Estate Investment Property, at Cost
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.description: Amount of real estate investment property which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestments.label: Real Estate Investments, Net
RealEstateInvestments.description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.

RealEstateInvestmentsJointVentures.label: Real Estate Investments, Joint Ventures
RealEstateInvestmentsJointVentures.description: The book value of investments in real estate joint ventures including direct and indirect investments.

RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Acquisition
RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments from acquisitions other than through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateOtherDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Deduction
RealEstateOtherDeductions.description: Amount of other deductions to real estate investments, excluding sales, for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateTaxExpense.label: Real Estate Tax Expense
RealEstateTaxExpense.description: A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land).

ReimbursementRevenue.label: Reimbursement Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ReimbursementRevenue.description: Repayment received or receivable for expenses incurred on behalf of a client or customer, other than those reimbursements received by landlords from tenants.

RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedPar.label: Repayment of Notes Receivable from Related Parties
RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedPar.description: The cash inflow from a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.description: Amount of depreciation expense of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

SecurityDepositLiability.label: Security Deposit Liability
SecurityDepositLiability.description: This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.

TenantImprovements.label: Tenant Improvements
TenantImprovements.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of improvements having a life longer than one year that were made for the benefit of one or more tenants.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
